## Matrix3x3 class

3x3 Matrix

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class Matrix3x3 extends VectorBase 
```
**Extends:** [VectorBase](doc/markdown/./base.vectorbase.md)

## Remarks

The matrix is column-major: \| m00, m10, m20 \| \| m01, m11, m21 \| \| m02, m12, m22 \|
